title: to the State body to which the following order applies, hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (Property Services Appeal 
Board) (Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on the 31st day of October 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29) (property service appeal board) (designation) order 2020 (2) order come operation 31st day october 2020

title: to the State body to which the following order applies, hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The Property Services Appeal Board is designated for the purposes of
text_raw:
2. The Property Services Appeal Board is designated for the purposes of 
section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 
2020 (No. 13 of 2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 October, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [484] 3
